title: How to Make a Virgin Flirtini

steps.headline: Rim a martini glass.
steps.description: Sprinkle granulated sugar in a small saucer or plate. Wet the rim with a lime wedge and dip the rim in the sugar until thoroughly coated.

steps.headline: Muddle the lime juice with the raspberries in a cocktail shaker.
steps.description: This allows the flavors of the raspberries to come out and combine with the lime juice.

steps.headline: Measure and pour the juices into the shaker.
Shake well and strain into the martini glass.
Top the drink off with the ginger ale/apple cider.
Add the garnishes.
steps.description: You may use a thin lime or pineapple slice to the side of the glass. A popular garnish idea is also dropping a maraschino cherry into the drink.
